WRITING.TITLE: Men are in relationships and still watch porn, may I ask why?

WRITING.TEXT:
Mid boning in my SO's parent's basement. Mom walks down to do laundry. 9 year old brother then comes down and proceeds to talk to mom for 10 minutes or so.
Happy we had a blanket.

I took a year off due to mental health and medical reasons and went back the following year. Am set to graduate in a few months. 10/10 would say that gap year was the best decision I've ever made. Some people need that time to figure themselves out and work on any issues they may have.
This was such a great answer.
